item.title: Technology bites us in the butt
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:7, topic:254295”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=336017.msg2611875#msg2611875 date=1230798365]
2009 started about 19.5 hours ago in New South Wales, Australia. I spent the night with a few mates - we had a few (too many) drinks, went for a ‘trudge’ (a long walk from my friend’s house to the petrol station - only made it half way before turning back because one of us fell over twice), and watched a few movies (Bad Santa, among others).

Not a bad start to 2009 in my opinion.
[/quote]
new wales? i’m suprised they named another place wales the first one is a shithole[/quote]
It’s New South Wales. And shuddup.

Read full topic
